ai-tha-ap126:1.1_0: I shook the stilt longhouse of Migāra’s mother
ai-tha-ap126:3.2_0: I realized the best of Buddha:
ai-tha-ap126:4.2_0: and the fragrance of the fairies;
ai-tha-ap126:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap126:5.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap126:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap126:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sandiya.
ai-tha-ap126:8.1_0: The fragrance of the senior mendicants is a fourth kind of existence.
